content: alexcrichton requested dicej for a review on PR #10158.

alexcrichton opened PR #10158 from alexcrichton:no-warnings-for-good to bytecodealliance:main:

Finishes the work started in #10131 and this means that the crate is no longer special and has the same default settings of all other crates in all situations.

alexcrichton commented on PR #10158:

This is going to be particularly gnarly, so I'm deferring this to a later date.
